price: 7. Seigneur des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu’il y a entre eux, pour peu que vous en ayez la certitude.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
